Detailed Description

A resource for interfacing asterisk directly as a client or a component to a jabber compliant server.

ExtRef:
Iksemel http://iksemel.jabberstudio.org/

Definition in file res_jabber.c.

01835    connected = iks_connect_via(client->p, S_OR(client->serverhost, client->jid->server), client->port, client->jid->server);
01836 
01837    if (connected == IKS_NET_NOCONN) {
01838       ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "JABBER ERROR: No Connection\n");
01839       return IKS_HOOK;
01840    } else   if (connected == IKS_NET_NODNS) {
01841       ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "JABBER ERROR: No DNS %s for client to  %s\n", client->name, S_OR(client->serverhost, client->jid->server));
01842       return IKS_HOOK;
01843    } else
01844       iks_recv(client->p, 30);
01845    return IKS_OK;
01846 }

02307    }
02308    return 1;

02031          ast_verbose("  Priority: %d\n", resource->priority);
02032          ast_verbose("  Status: %d\n", resource->status); 
02033          ast_verbose("  Message: %s\n", S_OR(resource->description,"")); 
02034       }
02035       ASTOBJ_UNLOCK(iterator);
02036    });
02037    ast_verbose("\nOooh a working message stack!\n");
02038    AST_LIST_LOCK(&client->messages);
02039    AST_LIST_TRAVERSE(&client->messages, tmp, list) {
02040       ast_verbose("  Message from: %s with id %s @ %s %s\n",tmp->from, S_OR(tmp->id,""), ctime(&tmp->arrived), S_OR(tmp->message, ""));
02041    }
02042    AST_LIST_UNLOCK(&client->messages);
02043    ASTOBJ_UNREF(client, aji_client_destroy);
02044 
02045    return RESULT_SUCCESS;
02046 }
